name: FlipOut
description:
FlipOut is a fun little puzzle game I made. The rules are very simple:

  • Click on a square to change it to a random different color
  • You may not click the same square twice in a row
  • You win when you get all the squares to the same color

Roll the mouse wheel to choose between 10 difficulty levels. The goal is to win in the fewest clicks and the shortest time. Good luck.
